mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.PRODUCT_NO, C.PRODUCT_COUNT, C.MEMBER_ID, C.PRODUCT_SIZE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_CHANGE, PS.STOCK_COUNT FROM CART C JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_SIZE PS ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PS.PRODUCT_NO AND C.PRODUCT_SIZE = PS.PRODUCT_SIZE WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( ORDER_IMPNO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_COUNT, CANCEL_STATUS, CANCEL_REASON ) VALUES ( #{orderImpNo}, #{productNo}, #{productCount}, '결제완료', NULL )
INSERT INTO CART ( CART_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_COUNT, CART_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_SIZE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CART_NO.NEXTVAL, #{productNo}, #{productCount}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, #{productSize} )
